item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 25, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. DeepMind releases Lyria 2 music generation model (33 points | 17 comments)
2. Notation as a Tool of Thought (1979) (49 points | 6 comments)
3. OpenAI releases image generation in the API (329 points | 182 comments)

10. You Can Be a Great Designer and Be Completely Unknown (119 points | 47 comments)
11. OpenVSX, which VSCode forks rely on for extensions, down for 24 hours (161 points | 67 comments)

13. Show HN: I built Lovable for text bots and mini apps (10 points | 3 comments)
14. Ask HN: Share your AI prompt that stumps every model (219 points | 388 comments)

17. Instant SQL for results as you type in DuckDB UI (291 points | 96 comments)

21. RFK Jr. Set to Launch Disease Registry Tracking Autistic People (31 points | 17 comments)
22. Fundamental flaws of SIMD ISAs (2021) (107 points | 78 comments)
23. A Principled Approach to Querying Data – A Type-Safe Search DSL (68 points | 8 comments)
24. A $20k electric truck with manual windows and no screens? Meet Slate Auto (17 points | 26 comments)
25. Microsoft subtracts C/C++ extension from VS Code forks (115 points | 106 comments)
26. Henry James Was Not at Home in America (4 points | discuss)
27. There's a Seeker Born Every Minute (9 points | 5 comments)
28. Bild AI (YC W25) is hiring a founding engineer in SF ( | hide)
